author: Tao Jin
title: autograde email
question: I don’t know why I will receive my autograde email after a long time instead of immediately.
student_answer: mine kept going straight to my junk so I kept re-submitting it waiting for the email (also jacking up my cool-down time) but eventually I realized it. maybe check to see if it goes to your junk or maybe you might just be having connection issues.
